verses.verse: ר֛וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> The Spirit אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> and יַ֡עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because מָשַׁח֩ <S%H4886><s%> hath anointed יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] upon me because the LORD אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> לְבַשֵּׂ֣ר <S%H1319><s%> me to preach good tidings עֲנָוִ֗ים <S%H6035><s%> unto the meek שְׁלָחַ֙נִי֙ <S%H7971><s%> he hath sent לַחֲבֹ֣שׁ <S%H2280><s%> me to bind up לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <S%H7665><s%> break down לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> care for לִקְרֹ֤א <S%H7121><s%> to proclaim לִשְׁבוּיִם֙ <S%H7617><s%> to the captives דְּר֔וֹר <S%H1865><s%> liberty וְלַאֲסוּרִ֖ים <S%H631><s%> to [them that are] bound פְּקַח־ קֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H6495><s%> and the opening of the prison

לִקְרֹ֤א <S%H7121><s%> To proclaim שְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> year רָצוֹן֙ <S%H7522><s%> the acceptable לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and the day נָקָ֖ם <S%H5359><s%> of vengeance לֵאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God לְנַחֵ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> to comfort כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲבֵלִֽים׃ <S%H57><s%> all that mourn

לָשׂ֣וּם ׀ <S%H7760><s%> To appoint לַאֲבֵלֵ֣י <S%H57><s%> unto them that mourn צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion לָתֵת֩ <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶ֨ם פְּאֵ֜ר <S%H6287><s%> unto them beauty תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead אֵ֗פֶר <S%H665><s%> for ashes שֶׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> the oil שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> of joy תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead אֵ֔בֶל <S%H60><s%> for mourning מַעֲטֵ֣ה <S%H4594><s%> the garment תְהִלָּ֔ה <S%H8416><s%> of praise תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> for the spirit כֵּהָ֑ה <S%H3544><s%> of heaviness וְקֹרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> that they might be called לָהֶם֙ אֵילֵ֣י <S%H352><s%> trees הַצֶּ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness מַטַּ֥ע <S%H4302><s%> the planting יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהִתְפָּאֵֽר׃ <S%H6286><s%> that he might be glorified

וּבָנוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> And they shall build חָרְב֣וֹת <S%H2723><s%> wastes עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> the old שֹׁמְמ֥וֹת <S%H8074><s%> desolations רִֽאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> the former יְקוֹמֵ֑מוּ <S%H6965><s%> they shall raise up וְחִדְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H2318><s%> and they shall repair עָ֣רֵי <S%H5892><s%> cities חֹ֔רֶב <S%H2721><s%> the waste שֹׁמְמ֖וֹת <S%H8074><s%> the desolations דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> of many וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

וְעָמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> shall stand זָרִ֔ים <S%H2114><s%> And strangers וְרָע֖וּ <S%H7462><s%> and feed צֹאנְכֶ֑ם <S%H6629><s%> your flocks וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons נֵכָ֔ר <S%H5236><s%> of the alien אִכָּרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H406><s%> [shall be] your plowmen וְכֹרְמֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H3755><s%> and your vinedressers

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you כֹּהֲנֵ֤י <S%H3548><s%> the Priests יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תִּקָּרֵ֔אוּ <S%H7121><s%> But ye shall be named מְשָׁרְתֵ֣י <S%H8334><s%> you the Ministers אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God יֵאָמֵ֖ר <S%H559><s%> [men] shall call לָכֶ֑ם חֵ֤יל <S%H2428><s%> the riches גּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> ye shall eat וּבִכְבוֹדָ֖ם <S%H3519><s%> and in their glory תִּתְיַמָּֽרוּ׃ <S%H3235><s%> shall ye boast

תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> Instead בָּשְׁתְּכֶם֙ <S%H1322><s%> For your shame מִשְׁנֶ֔ה <S%H4932><s%> [ye shall have] double וּכְלִמָּ֖ה <S%H3639><s%> and [for] confusion יָרֹ֣נּוּ <S%H7442><s%> they shall rejoice חֶלְקָ֑ם <S%H2506><s%> in their portion לָכֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore בְּאַרְצָם֙ <S%H776><s%> therefore in their land מִשְׁנֶ֣ה <S%H4932><s%> the double יִירָ֔שׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> they shall possess שִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> joy עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> everlasting תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶֽם׃

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For I the LORD אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> love מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment שֹׂנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> I hate גָזֵ֖ל <S%H1498><s%> robbery בְּעוֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> for burnt offering וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> and I will direct פְעֻלָּתָם֙ <S%H6468><s%> their work בֶּאֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> in truth וּבְרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> an everlasting אֶכְר֥וֹת <S%H3772><s%> and I will make לָהֶֽם׃

וְנוֹדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> shall be known בַּגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> among the Gentiles זַרְעָ֔ם <S%H2233><s%> And their seed וְצֶאֱצָאֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6631><s%> and their offspring בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among הָעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> the people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All רֹֽאֵיהֶם֙ <S%H7200><s%> all that see יַכִּיר֔וּם <S%H5234><s%> them shall acknowledge כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Because הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they זֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> them that they [are] the seed בֵּרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [which] the LORD ס

שׂ֧וֹשׂ <S%H7797><s%> I will greatly אָשִׂ֣ישׂ <S%H7797><s%> rejoice בַּֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD תָּגֵ֤ל <S%H1523><s%> shall be joyful נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> my soul בֵּֽאלֹהַ֔י <S%H430><s%> in my God כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הִלְבִּישַׁ֙נִי֙ <S%H3847><s%> for he hath clothed בִּגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> me with the garments יֶ֔שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> of salvation מְעִ֥יל <S%H4598><s%> me with the robe צְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> of righteousness יְעָטָ֑נִי <S%H3271><s%> he hath covered כֶּֽחָתָן֙ <S%H2860><s%> as a bridegroom יְכַהֵ֣ן <S%H3547><s%> decketh פְּאֵ֔ר <S%H6287><s%> [himself] with ornaments וְכַכַּלָּ֖ה <S%H3618><s%> and as a bride תַּעְדֶּ֥ה <S%H5710><s%> adorneth כֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3627><s%> [herself] with her jewels

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For כָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> For as the earth תּוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> bringeth forth צִמְחָ֔הּ <S%H6780><s%> her bud וּכְגַנָּ֖ה <S%H1593><s%> and as the garden זֵרוּעֶ֣יהָ <S%H2221><s%> causeth the things that are sown תַצְמִ֑יחַ <S%H6779><s%> in it to spring forth כֵּ֣ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> So אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> so the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD יַצְמִ֤יחַ <S%H6779><s%> to spring forth צְדָקָה֙ <S%H6666><s%> will cause righteousness וּתְהִלָּ֔ה <S%H8416><s%> and praise נֶ֖גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> before all the nations
